verses.content: Chu zoa chun Isu chu Diebol thlêma um dingin thlalêrah Thlarau ṭhuoi lûtin a um tah a.
Chun, ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli a nghei hnungin a phîng a hung ṭâm tah a.
Chun, thlêmtu chu a hung a, a kuomah, “Pathien Naupa i ni chun, hieng lunghai hi beia inchang dingin thu pe rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun, “Mi- hriem hi bei chauin hring naw ni hai a, Pathien baua thu tin suokin hring lem an tih,” ti ziek a nih, tiin a dawn a.
Chu zoa chun diebol chun khaw inthienga chun a ṭhuoi lût a, Pathien biekin sîp zuma chun a sieh a;

Chun, a kuomah, “Pathien Nau- pa i ni chun tla thla rawh; ‘I chungchânga chu a vântirkohai chu thu pêng a ta, An kutin dawm an ti cheh a, Chuong naw chun I kein lung sui hlau rawi i tih,’ ti ziek a ni si a,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “ ‘Lalpa i Pathien fie naw,’ ti ziek a ni ve bawk a nih,” a ta.
Chun, diebol chun tlâng insâng- takah a ṭhuoi nâwk a, khawvêl ram po po le a ropuina chu ân entir a.
A kuomah, “Bawkkhupin chibai i mi bûk chun, hieng po po hi pe vawng ka ti che,” a ta.
Chu phingleh Isûn, “Setan, fe hmang dai rawh; ‘Lalpa i Pathien chibai bûk la, ama rawng chau bâwl rawh,’ ti ziek a nih,” a ta.
Chu hnunga chun diebol chun a zâmsan tah a. Chun, ngai ta, vântir- kohaiin a rawng an bâwlpêk tah a.
Chun, Johan an man ti Isûn a hriet phingleh Galili ramah a fe ta dai a;
chun, Nazareth a mâksan a, Kapernaumah a um ta zing a, chu chu Zebulun le Naphtali biela dil panga um a nih:
zâwlnei Isai baua,
“Dîl tienga Jordan râlah, Zebulun le Naphtali ram, Jentailhai Galili;
Inthim hnuoia ṭhunghai chun var nasatak an hmuh a, Thina hmun le a hlima ṭhunghai chunga chun, Var a hung suok tah a,” tia a hril kha a hung tlung theina dingin.
Chu chena inthawk chu Isûn, “Sim ro, vân ram chu a hnai tah,” tiin a hril phut tah a.
Chun, Galili dil panga a lêng malamin, unau pahni, Simon (Peter an ti chu) a unau Andri leh dila chun lên dêngin a hmuh a; nga mantu an ni hrim a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Mi zui ro, chuongchun, mihriem mantuin siem ka ti cheu,” a ta.
Lênhai chu mâksanin an zui nghâl tah a.
Chutaka inthawk chun a fe pei a, unau dang pahni, Zebedai naupa Jakob le a unau Johan chu, an pa Zebedai kuoma lawngah an lênhai siemṭhain a hmuh a, anni chu a ko tah a.
Chuongchun, lawng le an pa chu an mâksan a, an zui nghâl tah a.
Chun, Isûn an inkhawmna inhaia inchûktirin, ram Chanchin Ṭha chu hrilin mihai laia natna tinrêng le hrât nawna tinrêng suk- damin Galili ram po po a fang pei a.

Chun, Suria ram po poah a chanchin ân thang tah a; chuong- chun, mi damnaw po po, damnawna le natna tinrênga nahai, khawhri imanhai, hringawl invawihai, zeng- hai a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a, a lo sukdam tâwl a.
Galili rama inthawk dâm, Dekapoli khuoa inthawk dâm, Jeru- salema inthawk dâm, Judai rama inthawk dâmin le Jordan râla inthawk dâm chun mipui nasatakin ama an zui bawk a.
